TextView.android:text: The player's goal is to assemble a hand worth a number of points thet exceeds the values of the dealer's hand. You need to collect no more than maximum of 21 points,or you lose (or bust).

Sic standars 52-cards deckare used in the game.In order to participate in round the player must place a bet. Once all bets have been placed,the dealer deals two face-up cards to each player and one face-up card and one face-down card to him- or herself.

Once the player and dealer have finished taking their card, the value of their final hand are compared. If the player score is higher than the dealer's, the player get a 1:1 payout onh their bet. If a player and the dealer have the same score (other than blackjack), this is considered a draw and the player gets their bet back. If the dealer's score is higher than the player's, the player loses.

If the first two cards in a hand are worth a total of 21 points, this hand is called BLACKJACK. If the dealer gets blackjack, all players lose other than those with blackjack. If both the dealer and a player have blackjack, this is considered a draw, and the player get their bet back.
If a player has a blackjack and the dealer does not, the player wins and gets 3:2 payout on their bet.
If neither the player nor the dealer have blackjack, the player can choose one of several actions once the cards have been dealt.
